text:
Gunnar Ernst Algot Sandgren (27 June 1929 – 4 November 2016) was a Swedish novelist and playwright. He made his literary debut in 1960, with the novel "Förklaringsberget". He later wrote a series of historical novels. He was awarded the Dobloug Prize in 1981.
Sandgren died on 4 November 2016 at the age of 87.
